cmd.generateSnippet.title: Generate snippet
cfg.snippetFilePath.description:
Specify the location of the snippet file.
 ex) C:\Users\***\Appdata\Roaming\Code\User\snippets\
 If the "default" does not work, please set the path.
 (NOTE: If you are using WSL, "default" will not work.)
 ex) /mnt/c/Users/***/Appdata/Roaming/Code/User/snippets/
ts.failed: Failed to register snippet. Please check "generateSnippet.snippetFilePath" in "setting.json".
ts.alreadyExists: Snippet with this name already exists.
